short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Helicopter is a simple and free game right on the chrome extension, click to let the plane fly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Helicopter is a simple and free game right on the chrome extension, click to make the plane fly up and release the left mouse button to make the plane move down. Your job is to overcome obstacles by controlling the plane to win in the end
